short_summary: Portable printing products for the Revenue Canada Agency.

full_summary:
### **Tender Announcement**
#### Corporate Name: Shared Services Canada

---

**Title (English):** Portable Printing Products for Canada Revenue Agency
**Title (French):** Produits d’impression portables pour l’Agence du revenu du Canada

---

#### Contract Details

**Contract Number (English):** SSC-22-00020781:T
**Contract Number (French):** SSC-22-00020781:T

**Publication Date:** November 21, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 1, 2022 (14:00 hours)

#### Additional Information

Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) is seeking bidders for a contract to supply and deliver portable printing products. This contract has a three (3) initial period with two (2) one (1) year options to extend.

**Commodity Details**

* **Estimated Quantity:** N/A
* **Duration:** Three (3) initial period with two (2) one (1) year options to extend
* **Delivery Timeframe:** To be specified in individual task authorizations (TAs)

**Special Requirements**

This procurement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. For more information, refer to Annex 9.4 of the Supply Manual.

**Set-Aside Program Requirements**

All contractors bidding on this tender must comply with the requirements outlined in Annex 9.4 of the Supply Manual.

**Bidding Information**

To obtain the solicitation package, access the Shared Services Canada procurement site: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/FEA494B3-CE91-461B-A298-42DC76766B29](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/FEA494B3-CE91-461B-A298-42DC76766B29)

**Contracting Information**

Contracting Party: Shared Services Canada
Correspondence Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 5Y3
Contact Person: Katherine Ikeson, katherine.ikeson@ssc.spc.gc.ca, 613-298-2147

#### Terms and Conditions

For any questions, please contact the designated representative.
Failure to comply with these requirements may result in the rejection of your bid.
